Articles.Content:
Floor 5116. A chair. A luxurious, comfortable, nice, and gorgeous chair.

in the meantime our next floor is 5117.

The true next floor is 5117,  you see any number other than 5117 its a lie, an untruth, a fabrication, a misdirection, a misnomer, a fallacy, and a falsehood. Reality says our next floor is 5117! Coldness lies, falsifies, fabricates falsehoods, misleads, and guides astray.

091807032024

new page! New beginnings or still conflicts?

091907032024

103407032024 reupholstered the fallen chair. Was that kosher?

Edited July 3 by AlamoVampire

Floor 5144:

Spoiler

[snip]

People waving.

Floor 5117: the real floor where the only threat is a one up to 5118.

094807032024

People, it's a game. I don't know how the sequence got confused, but does it really matter? It's only supposed to be for fun. If you're getting mad over it, why not just go find something else to do? 

By the power vested in me as head moderator, I decree that the next floor will be #5200. Either continue from there and play nice or we will close the thread. 

Also, some off topic and personal remarks removed.

A portal opens on floor 5117 and plants you on Floor 5200! You pat yourself finding all in order. You need a milk.

1029007032024
Floor 5201: A cheese warehouse. Amongst others are the ones used in the great hill roll, an event held each year.

Floor 5202: a molten vat of The Dip. Its omni present and blocks the exit. Only non toons can safely pass.

120307032024
Floor 5203: Giant Cracker Warehouse. You build a house out of some.
Floor 5204: A cracked giant, sticking out from the previous floor.

Floor 5205: a broken arm computer. You chuck it out the airlock and watch it float away.

182907032024

Floor 5206: Wine Warehouse with barrels that are completely sealed and safe from contamination. You bring out some cheese and crackers to go with.

Edited July 4 by ColdJ

Floor 5207: a sonic boom shattering glass and it salts any beverage below rendering it a waste

000007042024
Floor 5208: Sonic itself.

Floor 5209: 

013607042024
Floor 5210: A room full of TV execs scouring old computer games for cartoon ideas.

Floor 5211: there is no cold on this floor. Only warmth, only love, only compassion, only friendship, and the power of hugs.

045807042024
Floor 5212: Cushions, cushions everywhere.

Floor 5213: Friendship is magic! Friendship is fun! Kindness is cool! Milk anyone?

054807042024

Floor 5214: Curtains, curtains everywhere.

Floor 5215: a sign with an affirmation but you cant read it.

063507042024
Floor 5216: Warm water beds.

Floor 5217: echoes of the past caramel

073107042024
Floor 5218: Lots of lamps
Floor 5219: And nuke batteries for them.
Floor 5220: A junkyard of nuclear powered cars. Be careful you don't bump one.
